about.text: Front end developer with over twenty years of experience in software delivery.  Now specialising in ReactJS but also experience in vanilla javascript and other MVC frameworks such as Angular. Focusing toward TDD approach to software production.

skillsummary: These are my core skills other technologies I have been recently exposed to Java, Docker, Jenkins.
